title: Archery Score Sheet
alert_fill_fields: Please fill in Archer Name, Date, and Location.
alert_save_zero: You are saving a round with a score of 0. Continue?
alert_clear: Are you sure you want to clear the current scorecard? Unsaved progress will be lost.
alert_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this round?
alert_no_round: Please start a round before saving.
alert_could_not_save: Could not save the round. Your browser's storage might be full.
alert_could_not_get_location: Could not get location. Please enter it manually.
alert_could_not_get_weather: Could not get weather data for the specified location.
alert_first_record: This is your first record! Good luck!
alert_best_score: Awesome! This is your best score so far! 🎉
alert_below_average: Keep working hard! Every shot is an experience. 💪
alert_getting_better: Good job! Your results are improving. 👏
